article:
Hi, I'm Anna.My family and I are on a vacation  in Beidaihe. It's really a nice _ Do you want to know what my family are doing now?I'll tell you. My father is swimming _ the sea and he can _ very well. My mother is playing _ with others. Volleyball is her favorite sport. My brother is _ a book under the tree. The book must be very interesting _ he looks so happy.My sister is drawing something now. She likes drawing and there are many beautiful _ in her room. What about me? Oh, I'm lying on the beach  and watching the beautiful _ sky.
We all like this _ place a lot.
